Welcome to PublicLiabilityInsurance.ie  site  – the site for Professionals, Consultants and Tutors  seeking Public Liability insurance.

Over our many years in the Insurance Broking business we have seen that many small consultancies and tutors / teachers and Professionals  have difficulty arranging simple Public Liability insurance to cover their liability to members of the public arising from their occupation .  Buyers want Quick , Instant , Low cost Public Liability insurance for their business.

We have partnered with WR Berkley Insurance Group to provide the solution to the above – PublicLiabilityInsurance.ie  enables you to buy  Liability Insurance at  Low Cost and in an Instant and with a quality insurance company.

If you need Public Liability  cover then look no further, your public liability insurance search is over, click for an insurance quote!

In addition, for those that require same we can offer Professional Indemnity Insurance, the cover you need to protect your clients   from your negligence, oversight or incorrect advice. Previously only available at high minimum premiums- If you are interested in this cover please follow the link to our Professional Indemnity  insurance site (www.piinsurance.ie)

You can have your Public Liability insurance arranged within minutes  – click on the
Quote button below to find out how! Please remember we can also quote for other commercial business not only the ones listed
